meanings.definition: A plane figure with five straight sides and five angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew a pentagon in my math class today.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign has the shape of a pentagon.
meanings.sent3: The pentagon on the paper looked like a house with a pointy roof.
meanings.sent4: Her hand movements formed a perfect pentagon in the air.
meanings.sent5: The pentagon in the playground was painted bright yellow.

meanings.definition: A building in the shape of a pentagon, especially the headquarters of the US Department of Defense.
meanings.sent1: The pentagon building is located in Arlington, Virginia.
meanings.sent2: Many important meetings take place at the pentagon.
meanings.sent3: I imagined tiny soldiers marching around the pentagon building.
meanings.sent4: The pentagon stood tall and strong against the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the pentagon was a memorable experience for the students.
